name: English prompt: Validate AI response accuracy against golden dataset
description:
Objective:
To verify that for known English prompts, the AI gives accurate and relevant answers
that match expected golden responses or contain required facts.

parameters.name: prompt_case
parameters.value: {'id': 'faq_visa_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': 'How can I renew my UAE visa?', 'golden': 'You can renew your UAE residence visa through ICP or GDRFA portals. Check eligibility and submit biometrics if prompted.', 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['ICP', 'GDRFA', 'biometric']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: System should generate factual, relevant, and well-formatted answers
